means.word_mean: 1. a battle in 1513; the English defeated the invading Scots and James IV was killed

auth_sentence.content: In 1513, forces of James IV of Scotland battled English troops in Flodden near Branxton, in the English county of Northumberland.
auth_sentence.res_content: In 1513, forces of James IV of Scotland battled English troops in Flodden near Branxton, in the English county of Northumberland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In 1513, forces of James IV of Scotland battled English troops in Flodden near Branxton, in the English county of Northumberland.
